name: sip.js
title: SIP.js
description: A simple, intuitive, and powerful JavaScript signaling library
author: OnSIP <developer@onsip.com> (https://sipjs.com/aboutus/)

scripts.build-bundles: npm run build-reg-bundle && npm run build-min-bundle
scripts.copy-dist-files: cp dist/sip.js dist/sip-$npm_package_version.js && cp dist/sip.min.js dist/sip-$npm_package_version.min.js
scripts.build: npm run generate-grammar && npm run build-lib && npm run build-reg-bundle && npm run build-min-bundle && npm run copy-dist-files
scripts.browserTest: npm run build-test && sleep 2 && open http://0.0.0.0:9876/debug.html & karma start --reporters kjhtml --no-single-run
scripts.commandLineTest: npm run build-test && karma start --reporters mocha --browsers ChromeHeadless --single-run
scripts.buildAndTest: npm run build && npm run commandLineTest
scripts.buildAndBrowserTest: npm run build && npm run browserTest
scripts.build-docs-api: npm run extract-api && npm run document-api && npm run document-copy-api
scripts.build-docs-core: npm run extract-core && npm run document-core && npm run document-copy-core
scripts.build-docs: npm run build-lib && npm run build-docs-api && npm run build-docs-core
